participant_1.background:
I am a writer who enjoys the simple things in life, like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day.
My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
I am a student and my family is in business.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
i work 9 to 5 job.
i like watching ufc fights.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.

content.text: What are you passionate about in your life?
I love art and history, I went to school to become a museum curator
That is amazing! I like learning about art and history, but I do not think I would have the patience to curate a museum
It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding. I love getting to share my passion for art and history with others
That's great, I'm glad you found your passion.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I'm a writer, and I love gardening. I also like to spend time with my family and friends
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. I'm not much of a writer, but I love reading. I also like to watch UFC fights
I've never been much of a sports fan, but I can appreciate the athleticism of UFC fighters.
Yeah, they're some of the most incredible athletes in the world. I really admire their dedication and discipline
I'm sure they have to work really hard to get to where they are.
Absolutely. It's a lot of hard work and dedication, but it's worth it when you see them succeed
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're passionate about something you love. It makes life so much more enjoyable
Thanks! I agree, it's important to find what you love and pursue it with all your hear
